# Liquid: beyong flexbox


---

## For reference

Today there are more page requests from smartphones than from PCs

Web design now starts from the smartphone case

Sophisticated CSS files can actually change the way tags show on the basis of the actual screen, here called the *viewport*

The details are in Ch. 13 of the textbook and are left for reference, as we will adopt *Bootstrap* to address the topic of *responsive page*
